array.string: srm-1: <rdar://3183653> srm 1.2.6 with Apple mods, including large file and resource fork support
srm-2: Import changes from srm 1.2.7 release
srm-3: Import changes from srm 1.2.8 release
srm-3: <rdar://3570942> srm on directory containing an immutable file causes it to be renamed, but not unlinked
srm-3: <rdar://3784283> srm should be built with -mdynamic-no-pic
srm-4: Added write verification support (with --verify option)
srm-4: <rdar://3846412> srm needs an open source plist
srm-4: <rdar://4096410> srm: could overwrite end of buffer if blocksize mod 3 = 2
srm-4: <rdar://4096414> srm: overwrite_bytes restarts pattern every buffsize bytes
srm-4: <rdar://4096417> srm: performance on large files could improve if we don't erase 4k at a time
srm-4: <rdar://4096418> srm: when doing an random overwrite, we re-use the same 4K pattern during a single pass
srm-4: <rdar://4096421> srm: should avoid using buffer cache in target file being overwritten
srm-4: <rdar://4498712> srm: check for non-empty directory is broken
srm-5: <rdar://4567692> srm is crashing doing a secure erase
srm-6: <rdar://4686608> crash (divide by 0) when using srm -v on an empty file (Intel only)
